description.value:
This +2 resilient padded armor is woven from many strands of gut cord strung with dried organs and preserved xulgath scent glands. When worn, it infuses your body with a ghastly and nauseating flavor.

Activate F envision

Trigger You are grabbed or are hit by an unarmed attack

Effect Your attacker must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28] saving throw. Creatures with a stench aura, such as otyughs and xulgaths, are immune to this effect.

Success The creature is unaffected and is immune to the effects of the noxious jerkin for 1 minute.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1}.

Critical Failure The creature is sickened 1 and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.
